name: Insightful Gaze

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Stern gaze class feature, Sense Motive 5 ranks.

sections.body: Whenever you make a Sense Motive check to oppose someone's Bluff check, you can roll two dice and take the higher result.
sections.name: Benefits

description: In your personal interactions, you notice what others don't. It's hard to get anything past you.
